name: Rapid Orbit Planning Cell
description: Mission design sprints that force planners to produce executable orbits when threat timelines collapse.

cards.title: Ten-Minute Conjunction Plan
cards.description: Draft a maneuver response for a high-priority conjunction using only the last two TLE updates.
bulletpoints: Select burn vector that preserves mission
cards.summaryText: Rapid conjunction planning is an every-shift rep, not a once-a-quarter wargame.

cards.title: Payload Priority Trade
cards.description: Run a trade study when DV is constrained: which payload gets maneuver authority and why?
cards.summaryText: Guardians need muscle memory for payload triage before the CGO asks.

cards.title: Rapid Thermal Check
cards.description: Confirm thermal limits will hold during improvised slews or prolonged eclipses driven by emergency maneuvers.
cards.summaryText: Orbital plans die when thermal limits are afterthoughts.

cards.title: SDA Timeline Compression
cards.description: Compress the SDA update timeline by 30% using automation and pre-approved report snippets.
cards.summaryText: Fast SDA loops make rapid orbit planning credible.

cards.title: EVA Coordination Inject
cards.description: When EVA is scheduled, rehearse how rapid orbit changes impact crew safety zones and timeline.
cards.summaryText: Orbit planners must remember the humans bolted to the payload.

cards.title: Contested Spectrum Overlay
cards.description: Overlay planned burns with adversary spectrum usage to avoid coupling maneuvers with jamming spikes.
cards.summaryText: Spectrum context keeps emergency burns from triggering more chaos.
